ModelsÂ¶

Model key

Description

Reference

LCDM

Lambda Cold Dark Matter (\(\Lambda CDM\))

arXiv:0911.4858v2

LCDMasslessnu

\(\Lambda CDM\) with free neutrino mass (\(\Sigma m_{\nu} < 1\,{\rm eV}\))

nuCDM

\(\Lambda CDM\) with variable neutrino mass

arXiv:0911.4858v2

NeffLCDM

\(\Lambda CDM\) with effective neutrinos

noradLCDM

\(\Lambda CDM\) without radiation.

nuoLCDM

\(\Lambda CDM\) with curvature and variable neutrino mass

oLCDM

\(\Lambda CDM\) with curvature

wCDM

CDM cosmology with constant EoS w for Dark Energy

nuwLCDM

\(wCDM\) with variable neutrino mass

owowaCDM

CDM cosmology with w, wa and Ok. CPL parameterization with curvature

arXiv:gr-qc/0009008

wowaCDM

CPL (wowaCDM) without curvature

waCDM

CPL (wowaCDM) without w0

owCDM

CPL (wowaCDM) without wa

PolyCDM

Polynomial parameterization of the Hubble parameter

arXiv:1105.4943

fPolyCDM

PolyCDM with constant curvature

Decay

CDM cosmology with a decaying Dark Matter

arXiv:astro-ph/0403164

EarlyDE

Early Dark Energy cosmology, using Doran parameterization.

arXiv:astro-ph/0601544

SlowRDE

Slow Roll Dark Energy

arXiv:1301.4611

StepCDM

Cosmology with steps in \(\rho_DE(z)\)

arXiv:1204.2146

Spline

cosmology where \(\rho_DE(z)\) is defined by splines.

arXiv:1204.2146

WeirdCDM

Oscillating model

arXiv:
